column5: Bly and I just wanted to wish everyone a great Christmas / Hanukkah.  We are leaving first thing tomorrow morning to visit family in Michgan.  We'll be there for 8 days.  (help me...PLEASE help me!!! LOL).  Should be lots of fun...presents on Tuesday...and they have even planned for my little one going on her first horse ride.  Anyhow...to all that are travelling, please be safe... I truly hope that everyone has a wonderful holiday.  See you again just before new years.  Take care all!  Cliff and Bly
The best of the season to you both.  JF
I'm telling Mom (your mother in law) you said that. Safe jounry family and Merry Christmas to you as well. A little late on the Hanukkah but thanks. Love you Guys
....Safe journey you two and have a wonderful holiday.
Have a safe trip you guys, I know we'll hear from you down there   Merry Merry and all that  stuff  Maureen
have a great holiday  and do try to get some fishing in
Ya...What Terry said...Even Old Ho Ho likes to wet a line...    Merry Christmas to all OFNers...
From our family to yours ccmt have a safe trip and enjoy your Christmas with all of your family.
Merry x-mas to your family as well!!!!...have a great time,down there,see ya when you guys get back
